name: Templar
aura: Increases Ally RES in Arena Battles by 50.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
skills.name: Charge
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%

Level 5: Damage +10%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 4 times at random. Each hit has a 25% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Places a [Block Damage] buff on this Champion for 1 turn. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
skills.name: Taunt
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Attacks with this Champion's default skill whenever an enemy places a debuff on this Champion.
skills.name: Contempt [Passive]
